title: A Touch Eldritch
description: Beware! Short stories to make you dive for safety beneath your blankets. As the eldritch tales contained within are derived from the weird, sinister or ghostly, places of light and dark spook to fill your nightmares. Wait on a dying sister, fear the sinners plane, watch to see what moves in the sky and cheer for Pops as you take this paperback journey to new and scary places.
author: Elias A.G
